trans-unit.source: Represents an SQL transaction to be made at a data source.
trans-unit.target: 代表在資料來源進行的 SQL 異動。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.

The application creates an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction> object by calling <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式建立<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction>藉由呼叫物件<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>上<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>物件。

trans-unit.source: All subsequent operations associated with the transaction (for example, committing or aborting the transaction), are performed on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction> object.
trans-unit.target: 交易 （例如，認可或中止交易），相關聯的所有後續作業會執行上<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a nested database transaction.
Initiates a nested database transaction.
A nested database transaction.
The new transaction is nested within the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 新的交易巢狀在目前的交易。

trans-unit.source: Nested transactions are not supported.
The isolation level to use for the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 要用於交易的隔離等級。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a nested database transaction and specifies the isolation level to use for the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 啟始巢狀資料庫交易，並指定要用於新交易的隔離等級。

trans-unit.source: A nested database transaction.
The new transaction is nested within the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 新的交易巢狀在目前的交易。

trans-unit.source: Nested transactions are not supported.
Commits the database transaction.
The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection> and an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction>.

It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何使用<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>、 <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試認可交易時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
-or-
The connection is broken.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction, or <see langword="null" /> if the transaction is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得與交易相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection" /> 物件或 <see langword="null" /> (如果交易不再有效)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 與交易相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A single application may have multiple database connections, each with zero or more transactions.
trans-unit.target: 單一應用程式可能有多個資料庫連線，每個都有零個或多個交易。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction created by <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您判斷所建立的特定交易相關聯的連接物件<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定適用於此交易的 <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
The default is <see langword="ReadCommitted" />.
Parallel transactions are not supported.
Therefore, the <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> applies to the whole transaction.
Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

The transaction can only be rolled back from a pending state (after <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> has been called, but before <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A> is called).
trans-unit.target: 交易可以只會回復從暫止狀態 (之後<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>之前已呼叫<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A>稱為)。

trans-unit.source: The transaction will be rolled back in the event it is disposed before `Commit` or `Rollback` is called.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的事件中加以處置之前，將會回復交易`Commit`或`Rollback`呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection> and an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction>.

It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何使用<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>、 <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試認可交易時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
-or-
The connection is broken.
